titleStmt.title: The apology of the Church of England, and an epistle to one Seignior Scipio a Venetian gentleman, concerning the Council of Trent written both in Latin / by ... John Jewel ... ; made English by a person of quality ; to which is added, The life of the said bishop ; collected and written by the same hand.
Apologia Ecclesiae Anglicanae. English
titleStmt.author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
Person of quality.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. H. for Richard Chiswell ...,
